name: aftermath
caption: Aftermath

effect.short: Damages the attacker for 1/4 its max [HP]{mechanic:hp} when knocked out by a contact move.
effect.full: When this Pokémon is knocked out by a move that makes contact, the move's user takes 1/4 its maximum [HP]{mechanic:hp} in damage.

flavorText:
Damages the attacker if it contacts the Pokémon
with a finishing hit.
